query:
SELECT avt.id, avt.highlight_id, avt.status, avt.kling_task_id, avt.video_url, avt.error_message, avt.created_at,
       ph.title, ph.duration
FROM avatar_video_tasks avt
LEFT JOIN podcast_highlights ph ON avt.highlight_id = ph.id
ORDER BY avt.created_at DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user LtHxqrZriiUHME1.0a62a726ab17 --database kf362K9uEYqJammqLrrUaT --execute SELECT avt.id, avt.highlight_id, avt.status, avt.kling_task_id, avt.video_url, avt.error_message, avt.created_at,
       ph.title, ph.duration
FROM avatar_video_tasks avt
LEFT JOIN podcast_highlights ph ON avt.highlight_id = ph.id
ORDER BY avt.created_at DESC;
